The most common kind is the H5N1 strain.Swine Flu (H1N1)While swine flu isn't as scary as it seemed a few years ago, it's still important to protect yourself from getting it.View AllSign up for our free Good Health NewsletterGet wellness tips to help you live happier and healthierSubscribeBy clicking Subscribe, I agree to theWebMD Terms & Conditions&Privacy Policyand understand that I may opt out of WebMD subscriptions at any time.NewsFlu, RSV, and Norovirus Are in Full Swing, While COVID LoomsMost U.S. states are reporting high or very high flu-like activity, while COVID-19 rates remain lower than this time last year.Louisiana Person Is First Bird Flu-Linked Death in U.S.A person in Louisiana exposed to bird flu by a backyard flock has died. This marks the first U.S. human death linked to H5N1 avian flu.First Bird Flu Case in a Child Reported in CaliforniaA child in California has been infected with bird flu. It’s the first case of H5N1 influenza in a minor, and the number of human infections in the U.S. this year has now reached 55, according to the CDC.Bird Flu Fears Spark Recall of Raw Milk in CaliforniaCalifornia health officials are urging people to steer clear of a specific batch of raw milk after tests found it may contain the bird flu virus.Suggested Reads about Cold and Flu4 Ways You’re Making Your Cold WorseIf you can't seem to shake a lingering cold, these habits may be to blame.What’s Ear Wax For?Why do we even have oily, sticky stuff coming out of our ears? Is there a point to gross ear wax?Home Remedies for CoughsCheck your kitchen cabinets. You may find just what you need to sooth your throat and help you feel better, faster.Video on How to Soothe a Sore ThroatTry one of these remedies to ease symptoms brought on by a sore throat.Top Search Terms for Cold, Flu, & CoughCoronavirus (COVID-19)Flu ComplicationsSore Throat RemediesEar InfectionCold SymptomsLaryngitisEar Infection TreatmentFlu SymptomsOTC Cough MedicinesBird Flu8 million+ Physician Ratings & ReviewsFind Doctors and Dentists Near YouFind Doctors and Dentists Near YouThe location you tried did not return a result.
